text.div: • Include codes from http://unitsofmeasure.org where canonical = a

name: AllUCUMExpressionForTime
title: All UCUM Expression for Time
description: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). This value set includes all possible UCUM codes used for time measures (Age, Duration etc.) - that it is, all units which have the same canonical unit as 'a' (year)
copyright: The UCUM codes, UCUM table (regardless of format), and UCUM Specification are copyright Â© 1999-2009, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Unified Codes for Units of Measures (UCUM) Organization. All rights reserved.
